title: build.golang.org: not in UTF-8
body:
look at:
http://build.golang.org/log/423e69f3013268a160c14f08c6cb648bb4e0bd2a

note the mojibake at the bottom.

note the lack of utf-8 charset:

$ curl -v http://build.golang.org/log/423e69f3013268a160c14f08c6cb648bb4e0bd2a 
< Content-Type: text/plain
< Date: Wed, 03 Oct 2012 05:37:49 GMT
< Server: Google Frontend
< Cache-Control: private
< Transfer-Encoding: chunked
<
